comment.text: Receptor for inositol 1,4,5-trisphosphate, a second messenger that mediates the release of intracellular calcium.

Homotetramer. Interacts with TRPC1, TRPC3 and TRPC4. Interacts with TRPV4 (PubMed:18826956). Interacts with SIGMAR1 (By similarity). Interacts with PML and AKT1 (By similarity). Interacts with IRAG2 (via coiled-coil domain) (By similarity). Interacts with CABP1 (PubMed:12032348). Interacts with TMBIM4/LFG4 (PubMed:19553469). Interacts with CEMIP (PubMed:23936024). Interacts with TESPA1 (By similarity). Interacts with TMEM203 (PubMed:25996873). Interacts with BOK; regulates ITPR3 expression (By similarity). Interacts with BCL2L10 (PubMed:27995898).
Expressed in intestinal crypt and villus epithelial cells.

The receptor contains a calcium channel in its C-terminal extremity. Its large N-terminal cytoplasmic region has the ligand-binding site in the N-terminus and modulatory sites in the middle portion immediately upstream of the channel region.
Phosphorylated on tyrosine residues. Phosphorylated by AKT1 on serine and/or threonine residues (By similarity).
Belongs to the InsP3 receptor family.

property.value: Antigen activates B Cell Receptor (BCR) leading to generation of second messengers
Expressed in left lobe of thyroid gland and 225 other tissues
P:positive regulation of cytosolic calcium ion concentration
P:release of sequestered calcium ion into cytosol
